pkgmetadata.longdescription: # encoders- fast LabelEncoder for str and bytes to int## Install`pip install encoders`## Dev- `py -m pip install -r requirements-dev.txt`- use `py -m pre_commit run --all-files` to run pre-commit checks manually- `py test.py` to run tests, `py bench.py` to run benchmarks## Plans- fast Counter, MultiCounter for str and bytes
